title: Seagate, Alnylam Among Six Companies Set to Join Nasdaq 100
description: Six firms are set to join the Nasdaq 100 Index as part of its annual reconstitution, the benchmark’s overseer said Friday.
content: Six firms are set to join the Nasdaq 100 Index as part of its annual reconstitution, the benchmark’s overseer said Friday.
